## Provisional count of deaths involving coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) by United States county

The data used in this post is obtained from Data.Gov and it shows the provisional count of deaths involving coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19) by United States county.

The dataset is intended for public access and use.
